snippet: The Swedish Elitserien has been the only top European league to say that it will not sign N.H.L. players to short-term contracts. But Sweden's general counsel for competition plans to challenge the ban.
abstract: The Swedish Elitserien has been the only top European league to say that it will not sign N.H.L. players to short-term contracts. But Sweden's general counsel for competition plans to challenge the ban.

headline.main: In Event of Lockout, Swedish League Faces Challenge in Attempt to Bar N.H.L. Players
